title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 393.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 393.1 - General

State Regulations
(a) HEAP is a State
supervised program to assist eligible low-income households in meeting the
costs of home energy. Home energy means a source of heating in residential
dwellings. (b) Each social services
district shall administer HEAP in accordance with applicable Federal and State
statutes and regulations, the federally accepted State Plan, the HEAP manual
and applicable releases of the New York State Department of Social

Services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
393.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
